description: The only priest in an old church, and has known Heine for a long time. He is supposedly blind claiming he can "see" using his other senses. He has a Gothic-Lolita fetish and dresses Nill in the fashion. Despite his severe handicap, Bishop has been shown to be a swordsman of remarkable skill; having crossed swords with Fr√ºhling on even grounds and living to tell the tale. Heine once describes him as the church`s "fierce guardian".
name: Bishop
